statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.BrandID , AA.ImageID , AA.ImageType
, M1.Name as ImageTypeName , II.Url as ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TImage II WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageID = II.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ImageType' WHERE AA.BrandID = #BrandID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBrandImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrandImage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, BrandID, ImageID, ImageType ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #BrandID#, #ImageID#, #ImageType# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrandImage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ImageType = #ImageType# , ImageID = #ImageID# WHERE ID = #ID#
